TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit Calendar extends System.Windows.Controls.Control
.class public auto ansi Calendar extends System.Windows.Controls.Control

summary.span: 代表一个控件，此控件允许用户使用可视的日历显示来选择日期。

span.span: Represents a control that enables a user to select a date by using a visual calendar display.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件可单独使用，也可作为 控件的下拉部分使用。A control can be used on its own, or as a drop-down part of a control. 有关详细信息，请参阅 。For more information, see . > [!NOTE] > 仅支持公历。The supports only the Gregorian calendar. 下表提供了有关通常与 相关联的任务的信息。The following table provides information about tasks that are typically associated with the . |任务Task|实现Implementation| |----------|--------------------| |让 显示月、整年或十年。Have the display a month, an entire year, or a decade.|将 属性设置为月份、年份或十年。Set the property to Month, Year, or Decade.| |指定用户是否可以选择日期、日期范围或多个日期范围。Specify whether the user can select a date, a range of dates, or multiple ranges of dates.|使用 。Use the .| |指定不能选择的日期。Specify dates that cannot be selected.|使用 属性。Use the property.| |指定 显示的日期范围。Specify the range of dates that the displays.|使用 "" 和 "" 属性。Use the and properties.| |指定是否突出显示当前日期。Specify whether the current date is highlighted.|使用 属性。Use the property. 默认情况下， `true`。By default, is `true`.| |更改 的大小。Change the size of the .|使用 或将 属性设置为 。Use a or set the property to a . 请注意，如果您设置了 的 和 属性，则实际日历不会更改其大小。Note that if you set the and properties of a , the actual calendar does not change its size.| 控件使用鼠标或键盘提供基本导航。The control provides basic navigation using either the mouse or keyboard. 下表总结了键盘导航。The following table summarizes keyboard navigation. |键组合Key Combination||操作Action| |---------------------|-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|------------| |箭头ARROW||如果 属性未设置为 ，则更改 属性。Changes the property if the property is not set to .| |箭头ARROW||更改 属性的月份。Changes the month of the property. 请注意， 不会发生更改。Note that the does not change.| |箭头ARROW||更改 的年份。Changes the year of the . 请注意， 不会发生更改。Note that the does not change.| |SHIFT + 箭头SHIFT+ARROW||如果 未设置为 或 ，将扩展选定日期的范围。If is not set to or , extends the range of selected dates.| |主页HOME||将 更改为当月的第一天。Changes the to the first day of the current month.| |主页HOME||将 的月份更改为一年中的第一个月。Changes the month of the to the first month of the year. 不会更改。The does not change.| |主页HOME||将 的年份更改为十年的第一年。Changes the year of the to the first year of the decade. 不会更改。The does not change.| |EndEND||将 更改为当月的最后一天。Changes the to the last day of the current month.| |EndEND||将 中的月份更改为一年中的最后一个月。Changes the month of the to the last month of the year. 不会更改。The does not change.| |EndEND||将 的年份更改为十年的最后一年。Changes the year of the to the last year of the decade. 不会更改。The does not change.| |Ctrl+向上键CTRL+UP ARROW|任何Any|切换到下一个更大的 。Switches to the next larger . 如果 已 ，则不执行任何操作。If is already , no action.| |Ctrl+向下键CTRL+DOWN ARROW|任何Any|切换到下一个较小的 。Switches to the next smaller . 如果 已 ，则不执行任何操作。If is already , no action.| |空格键或 ENTERSPACEBAR or ENTER| 或 or |将 切换到焦点项表示的 或 。Switches to the or represented by focused item.| ## 自定义日历控件Customizing the Calendar Control 若要对多个 控件应用相同的属性设置，请使用 属性。To apply the same property settings to multiple controls, use the property. 您可以修改默认 以使控件具有独特的外观。You can modify the default to give the control a unique appearance. 有关创建 的详细信息，请参阅[通过创建 System.windows.controls.controltemplate> 自定义现有控件的外观](/dotnet/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control)。For more information about creating a , see [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](/dotnet/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control). 若要查看特定于 的部分和状态，请参阅[日历样式和模板](/dotnet/framework/wpf/controls/calendar-styles-and-templates)。To see the parts and states that are specific to the , see [Calendar Styles and Templates](/dotnet/framework/wpf/controls/calendar-styles-and-templates). 此控件的依赖属性可能由控件的默认样式设置。Dependency properties for this control might be set by the control's default style. 如果按默认样式设置属性，则当控件出现在应用程序中时，属性可能会更改为默认值。If a property is set by a default style, the property might change from its default value when the control appears in the application. 默认样式取决于应用程序运行时使用的桌面主题。The default style is determined by which desktop theme is used when the application is running. 有关详细信息，请参阅[默认的 WPF 主题](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252)。For more information, see [Default WPF Themes](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252). [!INCLUDE[setting-a-visual-property](~/includes/visual-property-note.md)] ## XAML 对象元素用法XAML Object Element Usage ``` ``` ## Examples 下图显示了两个 控件，一个具有选择和中断日期，另一个不包含。The following illustration shows two controls, one with selections and blackout dates and one without. ![日历控件](~/add/media/ndp-calendarcontrols.png "日历控件")![Calendar controls](~/add/media/ndp-calendarcontrols.png "Calendar controls") 日历控件Calendar controls 下面的代码和 XAML 会创建一个具有两个 控件的页，这与上图类似。The following code and XAML creates a page with two controls that is similar to the previous illustration. [!code-csharp[CalendarSnippets#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/calendarsnippets/csharp/window1.xaml.cs#1)] [!code-vb[CalendarSnippets#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/calendarsnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#1)] [!code-xaml[CalendarSnippets#1](~/samples/snippets/xaml/VS_Snippets_Wpf/calendarsnippets/xaml/window1.xaml#1)]

summary.span: 获取标记为不可选择的日期的集合。

span.span: Gets a collection of dates that are marked as not selectable.

value.span: 不可选择的日期的集合。

span.span: A collection of dates that cannot be selected.
The default value is an empty collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此集合中的日期将以灰色显示，并在日历上删除。Dates in this collection will appear gray and crossed out on the calendar. 若要使过去的所有日期都不可选择，可以使用由此属性返回的集合提供的 方法。To make all past dates not selectable, you can use the method provided by the collection returned by this property. ## XAML 属性元素用法XAML Property Element Usage ``` ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values *oneOrMoreCalendarDateRanges**oneOrMoreCalendarDateRanges* 类型的一个或多个对象元素。One or more object elements of type . ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个具有无法选择的日期的 。The following example creates a that has some dates that cannot be selected. [!code-csharp[CalendarSnippets#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/calendarsnippets/csharp/window1.xaml.cs#3)] [!code-vb[CalendarSnippets#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/calendarsnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#3)] [!code-xaml[CalendarSnippets#3](~/samples/snippets/xaml/VS_Snippets_Wpf/calendarsnippets/xaml/window1.xaml#3)] 前面的示例生成类似于下图的输出。The preceding example produces output that is similar to the following illustration. ![不能选择日期的日历。](~/add/media/ndp-calendarblackout.png "包含不可选择的日期的日历。")![Calendar with dates that cannot be selected.](~/add/media/ndp-calendarblackout.png "Calendar with dates that cannot be selected.") 不能选择日期的日历Calendar with dates that cannot be selected

summary.span: 获取或设置要显示的日期。

span.span: Gets or sets the date to display.
The date to display.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks "" 和 "" 属性指定日历显示的内容以及日历中的焦点。The and properties specify what the calendar displays and what has focus within the calendar. 仅当 设置为 Month 时，用户才可以更改 ，但当日历处于年和十年模式时，用户可能更改 。The user can change the only when is set to Month, but the user might change the when the Calendar is in Year and Decade mode. 下表描述了模式如何更改 。The following table describes how the mode changes the . |DisplayModeDisplayMode|操作Action| |-----------------|------------| |月Month|当用户导航到不同月份时， 更改。 changes when the user navigates to a different month.| |年Year|当用户单击或导航到不同月份时， 的月份会更改。The month of changes when the user clicks or navigates to a different month.| |十年Decade|当用户单击或导航到另一年时， 的年份会发生更改。The year of changes when the user clicks or navigates to another year.| 如果 的值超出 和 属性指定的日期范围，则会将其忽略。 is ignored if its value is outside of the range of dates that is specified by and properties. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|| ## XAML 特性用法XAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values *dateTimeString**dateTimeString* 采用[DATETIME XAML 语法](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/datetime-xaml-syntax)主题中列出的一种格式的日期。A date that is in one of the formats that are listed in the [DateTime XAML Syntax](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/datetime-xaml-syntax) topic. ## Examples 以下代码设置具有特定可显示日期范围的 ，并设置当前所选和显示的日期。The following code sets up a with a particular range of displayable dates, and sets the currently selected and displayed date. [!code-csharp[CalendarSnippets#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/calendarsnippets/csharp/window1.xaml.cs#2)] [!code-vb[CalendarSnippets#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/calendarsnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#2)] [!code-xaml[CalendarSnippets#2](~/samples/snippets/xaml/VS_Snippets_Wpf/calendarsnippets/xaml/window1.xaml#2)]

summary.span: 获取或设置日历中可用日期范围内的最后一个日期。

span.span: Gets or sets the last date in the date range that is available in the calendar.

value.span: 日历中最后一个可用日期。

span.span: The last date that is available in the calendar.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以通过设置 和 属性来限制 范围。You can restrict the range of a by setting the and properties. 用户不能滚动到或选择超出此范围的日期。A user cannot scroll to or select dates outside of this range. 如果将 属性设置为 后的日期， 设置为与 相同的值。If you set the property to a date that is after , is set to the same value as . ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|| ## XAML 特性用法XAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values *dateTimeString**dateTimeString* 采用[DATETIME XAML 语法](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/datetime-xaml-syntax)主题中列出的一种格式的日期。A date that is in one of the formats that are listed in the [DateTime XAML Syntax](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/datetime-xaml-syntax) topic. ## Examples 以下代码设置具有特定可显示日期范围的 ，并设置当前所选和显示的日期。The following code sets up a with a particular range of displayable dates, and sets the currently selected and displayed date. remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以通过设置 "" 和 "" 属性来限制日历范围。You can restrict the range of a Calendar by setting the and properties. 用户不能滚动到或选择超出此范围的日期。A user cannot scroll to or select dates outside of this range. 如果将 属性设置为 之前的日期， 设置为与 相同的值。If you set the property to a date that is before , is set to the same value as . ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|| ## XAML 特性用法XAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values *dateTimeString**dateTimeString* 采用[DATETIME XAML 语法](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/datetime-xaml-syntax)主题中列出的一种格式的日期。A date that is in one of the formats that are listed in the [DateTime XAML Syntax](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/datetime-xaml-syntax) topic. ## Examples 以下代码设置具有特定可显示日期范围的 ，并设置当前所选和显示的日期。The following code sets up a with a particular range of displayable dates, and sets the currently selected and displayed date. summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示日历是显示月份、年份还是十年期。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the calendar displays a month, year, or decade.

value.span: 一个指示 应显示的时间长度的值。

span.span: A value that indicates what length of time the should display.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 日历可以显示月份、年份或十年。A Calendar can display a month, a year, or a decade. 下表列出了用户如何导航到每个模式。The following table lists how the user navigates to each mode. |DisplayModeDisplayMode|操作Action| |-----------------|------------| |月Month|若要导航到 Year 模式，请单击月份标题。To navigate to Year mode, click the month heading.| |年Year|若要导航到十年模式，请单击年份标题。To navigate to Decade mode, click the year heading. 若要导航到月模式，请单击显示的月份之一。To navigate to Month mode, click one of the displayed months.| |十年Decade|若要导航到 Year 模式，请单击显示的年份之一。To navigate to Year mode, click one of the displayed years.| ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|| ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个日历，其中显示一年中的月份并处理 事件，以便在用户单击月份或年份时，日历不会更改其 。The following example creates a calendar that displays the months in a year and handles the event so that when the user clicks on a month or the year, the calendar does not change its . [!code-csharp[CalendarSnippets#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/calendarsnippets/csharp/window1.xaml.cs#4)] [!code-vb[CalendarSnippets#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/calendarsnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#4)] [!code-xaml[CalendarSnippets#4](~/samples/snippets/xaml/VS_Snippets_Wpf/calendarsnippets/xaml/window1.xaml#4)] [!code-csharp[CalendarSnippets#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/calendarsnippets/csharp/window1.xaml.cs#5)] [!code-vb[CalendarSnippets#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/calendarsnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#5)]

span.span: The data for the event.

summary.span: 为在此控件有焦点的情况下用户按任意键时发生的 路由事件提供类处理。

span.span: Provides class handling for the routed event that occurs when the user presses a key while this control has focus.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 重写 方法以支持键盘导航。 overrides the method to support keyboard navigation. 有关详细信息，请参阅 类。For more information, see the class. 此实现通过将事件数据的 属性设置为 "已处理"，将 事件标记为 "已处理"，以便在按键（如按下箭头键）执行导航操作时 `true`。This implementation marks the event as handled by setting the property of the event data to `true` when a keystroke, such as pressing an ARROW key, performs a navigation action.

para.span: 如果重写 ，请始终在 实现中调用基实现。

span.span: If you override , always call the base implementation in your implementation.

para.span: 未能调用基实现会阻止基类使用类处理程序来处理事件，这可能会更改最终类的运行时行为。

span.span: Failure to call the base implementation prevents base classes from handling the event with a class handler, which might change the run-time behavior of the final class.

para.span: 你可以在特殊处理之前或之后调用基本实现，具体取决于你的要求。

span.span: You can call the base implementation either before or after your special handling, depending on your requirements.

para.span: 如果重写 ，请始终在 实现中调用基实现。

span.span: If you override , always call the base implementation in your implementation.

para.span: 未能调用基实现会阻止基类使用类处理程序来处理事件，这可能会更改最终类的运行时行为。

span.span: Failure to call the base implementation prevents base classes from handling the event with a class handler, which might change the run-time behavior of the final class.

para.span: 你可以在特殊处理之前或之后调用基本实现，具体取决于你的要求。

span.span: You can call the base implementation either before or after your special handling, depending on your requirements.

The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|| 当 设置为 时使用此属性。Use this property when is set to . 在其他模式下，此属性将始终是 中的第一个日期。In other modes, this property will always be the first date in . ## XAML 特性用法XAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values *dateTimeString**dateTimeString* 采用[DATETIME XAML 语法](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/datetime-xaml-syntax)主题中列出的一种格式的日期。A date that is in one of the formats that are listed in the [DateTime XAML Syntax](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/datetime-xaml-syntax) topic. ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个具有特定可显示日期范围的 ，并设置当前所选和显示的日期。The following example creates a with a particular range of displayable dates, and sets the currently selected and displayed date. MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property SelectedDates As SelectedDatesCollection

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取选定日期的集合。

span.span: Gets a collection of selected dates.

value.span: 包含当前选定日期的 对象。

span.span: A object that contains the currently selected dates.
The default is an empty collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以使用 方法将日期单独或范围添加到集合中。Dates can be added to the collection either individually or in a range using the method. 根据 属性的值，将日期或范围添加到集合可能导致清除该集合。Depending on the value of the property, adding a date or range to the collection may cause it to be cleared. 下表列出了 对 属性的影响。The following table lists how affects the property. |CalendarSelectionModeCalendarSelectionMode|说明Description| |---------------------------|-----------------| ||不允许选定内容。No selections are allowed. 无法设置 ，并且不能将任何值添加到 中。 cannot be set and no values can be added to .| ||只能选择单个日期，方法是设置 或 中的第一个值。Only a single date can be selected, either by setting or the first value in . 不能使用 。 cannot be used.| ||只能选择一个日期范围。A single range of dates can be selected. 设置 、将日期单独添加到 或使用 将从 中清除以前的所有值。Setting , adding a date individually to , or using will clear all previous values from .| ||可以选择多个非连续范围的日期。Multiple non-contiguous ranges of dates can be selected. 将日期单独添加到 或使用 不会清除 。Adding a date individually to or using will not clear . 设置 仍将 清除，但随后可以添加其他日期或范围。Setting will still clear , but additional dates or ranges can then be added. 添加包含某些已选择的日期或与其他范围重叠的范围会导致范围的并集不会引发异常。Adding a range that includes some dates that are already selected or overlaps with another range results in the union of the ranges and does not cause an exception.| ## XAML 属性元素用法XAML Property Element Usage ``` ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values *oneOrMoreDateTimeObjects**oneOrMoreDateTimeObjects* 一个或多个 对象元素。One or more object elements. ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个具有多个选定日期范围的 。The following example creates a that has multiple ranges of dates selected. [!code-csharp[CalendarSnippets#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/calendarsnippets/csharp/window1.xaml.cs#3)] [!code-vb[CalendarSnippets#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/calendarsnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#3)] [!code-xaml[CalendarSnippets#3](~/samples/snippets/xaml/VS_Snippets_Wpf/calendarsnippets/xaml/window1.xaml#3)]
